title: Cookie Consent
description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR regulations.
necessaryDesc: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website through Google Analytics.
preferencesDesc: Remember your preferences and provide enhanced, personalized features.
marketingDesc: Track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
policyIntro: For more information about how we use cookies, please visit our
contactInfo: If you have any questions, please contact us at
acceptAllToastDesc: All cookie preferences have been saved.
acceptSelectedToastDesc: Your cookie preferences have been saved.
rejectAllToastDesc: Only essential cookies will be used.
